#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Amy Scobee in 2007 Image : Amy Scobee .
#Text=It was
#Text=September , 1979 .
#Text=Word arrived that an expansion event was being held in the Seattle church for all local Scientologists by officers of the Sea Org .
#Text=Attendance was mandatory .
#Text=My mother and I went to the event together .
#Text=As people arrived , we were all ushered in and seated in a large hall .

#Text=Before the event began , surveys were passed out for the audience to fill in , asking detailed questions about our individual qualifications , such as whether or not we had ever taken LSD , ever been institutionalized , if we had a criminal record , had huge personal debts and so forth .
#Text=My answer to every one of these questions was , " No " .
#Text=The surveys were collected up and the event began .

#Text=The speaker came out and briefed us on the strategy to make Scientology a household word internationally and how it was vital for everyone to immediately get on the bandwagon to help make this a reality .
#Text=He had a large map of the world behind him and pointed out the small red dots as current church locations , which appeared minuscule compared to the size of the planet .
#Text=Then , in the middle of the event , the speaker read out a list of people who were to report immediately to a room in the back for a private briefing .
#Text=My name was on the list .
#Text=I felt my heart pounding as I could n’t figure out how they knew my name .
#Text=I had forgotten all about filling out the survey prior to the event .
#Text=My mom ’s name was n’t on the list , so I had to go to the special briefing without her .
#Text=I reported to the back , along with about twenty others from the audience .

#Text=The main event speaker ( named Don ) came to the back room , along with three other people in full dress Sea Org uniform ( navy caps , gold lanyards , white gloves , dirks tied around their waist – the works ) .
#Text=He informed us that we were the select few who were qualified and that we were all to join the elite team of the Sea Org – right now !
#Text=Don said that while he moved on to the next city to get many more people on board , two SO members were staying behind in Seattle to get all of us packed and sent off to the Sea Org .
#Text=He handed out Sea Org contracts , had us all stand up , raise our right hands and repeat the code of a Sea Org member after him .
#Text=This is called the " swearing in ceremony " .
#Text=We all then signed the contract , pledging to work full time for the next billion years .
#Text=I had no clue what I was doing .
#Text=I wondered why my mom ’s name was n’t called and what she would think .
#Text=I did n’t dare question the Sea Org Officers .
#Text=Everyone was following orders and I thought I had better as well .
#Text=I did ask what type of work we ’d be doing and the response was , " Our mission is to get ethics in on this planet and the universe .

#Text=You ’re joining the elite of the elite , responsible for handling the suppressive psychiatrists that exist in the here and now and those who implant beings between lives so as to make planetary clearing an actuality  .
